channel.title: [317] Adding Pk points
channel.description: Does anyone have a tutorial that I can use, or can someone explain what to do :)?

I CTRL+F on ever .java file and searched for QP and nothing. Anyone? And where should I put this:sendQuest(“PVP: “+pkpoints+””, 3985); then?

item.title: [317] Adding Pk points
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Try removing this part, it’s not really needed and may be simpler.

if(killerz.isclangame == false) {
if(killerz.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && connectedFrom.equals(killerz.connectedFrom)) {
killerz.sM("Multiple IP detected, you will not recieve any points or title.");
} else {
killerz.pkpoints += 1;
killerz.sM("You have killed "+playerName+", you now have "+killerz.pkpoints+" PvPP.");
}
} else {
}

item.title: [317] Adding Pk points
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

I’m coming off 7 errors referring to one thing. I don’t have killerz defined. As shown here:

Since you loaned me that much can you show me what you defined for killerz also
**I want your to hopefully make error solving a minimum.

Btw, thank you SO much for all the help so far.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2009, 02:03:08 pm[/size][hr]Okay, I took out killerz and changed my code from:

if(killerz.isclangame == false) { if(killerz.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && connectedFrom.equals(killerz.connectedFrom)) { killerz.sM("Multiple IP detected, you will not recieve any points or title."); } else { killerz.pkpoints += 1; killerz.sM("You have killed "+playerName+", you now have "+killerz.pkpoints+" PvPP."); } } else { }

to:

if(connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom)) { sM("Multiple IP detected, you will not recieve any points or title."); } else { pkpoints += 1; sM("You have killed "+playerName+", you now have "+pkpoints+" PvPP."); }

As soon as I log in “Multiple IP detected, you will not recieve any points or title.” spams and won’t stop.

item.title: [317] Adding Pk points
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Try this, but make sure to backup you’re files. This is what I’ve got in my source, and it works perfectly.

Declare

public int pkpoints = 0;

Now search for something like

} else if (token.equals("character-special")) { specialAmount = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Add this underneath :

} else if (token.equals("character-pk")) { pkpoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Also place this somewhere below :

} else if (token.equals("character-pkpoints")) { pkpoints = Integer.parseInt(token2); }

Now put this in public boolean process()

sendQuest("PVP: "+pkpoints+"", 3985);

Put this somewhere

if(killerz.isclangame == false) { if(killerz.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && connectedFrom.equals(killerz.connectedFrom)) { killerz.sM("Multiple IP detected, you will not recieve any points or title."); } else { killerz.pkpoints += 1; killerz.sM("You have killed "+playerName+", you now have "+killerz.pkpoints+" PvPP."); } } else { }

Search for characterfile.newLine(); and put this under it :

characterfile.write("character-pk = ", 0, 15); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pkpoints), 0, Integer.toString(pkpoints).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-pkpoints = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pkpoints), 0, Integer.toString(pkpoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Read full topic

In the future I will be making it so two shops let you spend your pk points on items.
